info.author: Kjell Magne Fauske
info.description:
BibConverter is a web application and a library for direct conversion
of data from online bibliographic databases to the BibTeX format.
It extracts data from text copied directly from the web page and
outputs BibTeX records that contains much more information than
citations exported using the export functionality provided by the
bibliographic services. BibConverter currently supports conversion of
data from IEEEXplore_, `Engineering Village`_ and `ISI Web of Science`_.

.. _IEEEXplore: http://ieeexplore.ieee.org/
.. _Engineering Village: http://www.engineeringvillage2.org/
.. _ISI Web of Science: http://wos.isiknowledge.com/
info.name: BibConverter
info.summary: Convert data from IEEEXplore, EV, and ISI WoS to the BibTeX format
info.html_description: BibConverter is a web application and a library for direct conversion of data from online bibliographic databases to the BibTeX format. It extracts data from text copied directly from the web page and outputs BibTeX records that contains much more information than citations exported using the export functionality provided by the bibliographic services. BibConverter currently supports conversion of data from IEEEXplore, Engineering Village and ISI Web of Science.
